fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The query root of this schema

fields.description: The mutation root of this schema

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: The subscription root of this schema

types.name: __Type
types.description: A type in the GraphQL schema

fields.name: fields
fields.description: List of fields on this object

fields.name: ofType
fields.description: The modified type of this type

fields.name: possibleTypes
fields.description: Types which compose this Union or Interface

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: The kinds of types in this GraphQL system

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for accessing this field

fields.name: type
fields.description: The return type of this field

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: An input for a field or InputObject

fields.name: description
fields.description: What this value is used for

fields.name: type
fields.description: The expected type for this value

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: The value applied if no other value is provided

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: A possible value for an Enum

types.name: __Directive
types.description: A query directive in this schema

fields.name: onOperation
fields.description: Does this directive apply to operations?

fields.name: onFragment
fields.description: Does this directive apply to fragments?

fields.name: onField
fields.description: Does this directive apply to fields?

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Ignore this part of the query if `if` is true

directives.name: include
directives.description: Include this part of the query if `if` is true
